languages.text: ...лично возглавил{mf||а} атаку, собственным примером вдохновляя гвардейцев на служение Богу-Императору. Полк проявил небывалую отвагу перед лицом смертельной опасности, хотя высшие чины не одобрили неоправданный риск.

...personally led the attack, inspiring the Guards by {mf|his|her} own example to fulfil their duty to the God-Emperor. The regiment displayed unprecedented bravery in the face of mortal danger, although the higher ranks did not approve of the unwarranted risk.
languages.original_text: ...лично возглавил{mf||а} атаку, собственным примером вдохновляя гвардейцев на служение Богу-Императору. Полк проявил небывалую отвагу перед лицом смертельной опасности, хотя высшие чины не одобрили неоправданный риск.

traits.locale_text: ...personally led the attack, inspiring the Guards by {mf|his|her} own example to fulfil their duty to the God-Emperor. The regiment displayed unprecedented bravery in the face of mortal danger, although the higher ranks did not approve of the unwarranted risk.

...personally led the attack, inspiring the Guards by {mf|his|her} own example to fulfil their duty to the God-Emperor. The regiment displayed unprecedented bravery in the face of mortal danger, although the higher ranks did not approve of the unwarranted risk.

...personally led the attack, inspiring the Guards by {mf|his|her} own example to fulfil their duty to the God-Emperor. The regiment displayed unprecedented bravery in the face of mortal danger, although the higher ranks did not approve of the unwarranted risk.

...personally led the attack, inspiring the Guards by {mf|his|her} own example to fulfil their duty to the God-Emperor. The regiment displayed unprecedented bravery in the face of mortal danger, although the higher ranks did not approve of the unwarranted risk.

languages.text: ……亲自带队进攻，身先士卒，激励士兵们履行对神皇的职责。这支军团在面对致命危险时，展现出了前所未有的勇气，不过上级指挥官并不赞成这种无谓的冒险。
languages.original_text: ...personally led the attack, inspiring the Guards by {mf|his|her} own example to fulfil their duty to the God-Emperor. The regiment displayed unprecedented bravery in the face of mortal danger, although the higher ranks did not approve of the unwarranted risk.

traits.locale_text: ……亲自带队进攻，身先士卒，激励士兵们履行对神皇的职责。这支军团在面对致命危险时，展现出了前所未有的勇气，不过上级指挥官并不赞成这种无谓的冒险。

languages.text: ... lideró personalmente el ataque, inspirando a los guardias con su ejemplo para que cumplieran su deber hacia el Dios Emperador. El regimiento demostró un valor sin precedentes frente al peligro mortal, aunque los oficiales superiores consideraron que era un riego innecesario.
languages.original_text: ...personally led the attack, inspiring the Guards by {mf|his|her} own example to fulfil their duty to the God-Emperor. The regiment displayed unprecedented bravery in the face of mortal danger, although the higher ranks did not approve of the unwarranted risk.

traits.locale_text: ... lideró personalmente el ataque, inspirando a los guardias con su ejemplo para que cumplieran su deber hacia el Dios Emperador. El regimiento demostró un valor sin precedentes frente al peligro mortal, aunque los oficiales superiores consideraron que era un riego innecesario.

languages.text: …個人的に攻撃を指揮し、{mf|彼|彼女}自身の模範によって衛兵たちに神帝陛下への聖務成就の誓いを果たすよう鼓舞した。連隊は致命的な危険に直面し。前代未聞の勇気を示したが、上層部は不当な危険を容認しなかった。
languages.original_text: ...personally led the attack, inspiring the Guards by {mf|his|her} own example to fulfil their duty to the God-Emperor. The regiment displayed unprecedented bravery in the face of mortal danger, although the higher ranks did not approve of the unwarranted risk.

traits.locale_text: …個人的に攻撃を指揮し、{mf|彼|彼女}自身の模範によって衛兵たちに神帝陛下への聖務成就の誓いを果たすよう鼓舞した。連隊は致命的な危険に直面し。前代未聞の勇気を示したが、上層部は不当な危険を容認しなかった。

languages.text: ... führte den Angriff persönlich an und spornte die Garde durch sein eigenes Beispiel an, ihre Pflicht gegenüber dem Gottkaiser zu erfüllen. Das Regiment bewies angesichts der tödlichen Gefahr eine beispiellose Tapferkeit, auch wenn die höheren Ränge das ungerechtfertigte Risiko nicht guthießen.
languages.original_text: ...personally led the attack, inspiring the Guards by {mf|his|her} own example to fulfil their duty to the God-Emperor. The regiment displayed unprecedented bravery in the face of mortal danger, although the higher ranks did not approve of the unwarranted risk.

traits.locale_text: ...personally led the attack, inspiring the Guards by {mf|his|her} own example to fulfil their duty to the God-Emperor. The regiment displayed unprecedented bravery in the face of mortal danger, although the higher ranks did not approve of the unwarranted risk.

languages.text: ... a mené personnellement l'assaut, en incitant les gardes par l'exemple à accomplir leur devoir envers l'Empereur-Dieu. Le régiment a fait preuve d'une bravoure sans précédent face à l'adversité, mais les hauts gradés n'ont pas approuvé cette prise de risque inconsidérée.
languages.original_text: ...personally led the attack, inspiring the Guards by {mf|his|her} own example to fulfil their duty to the God-Emperor. The regiment displayed unprecedented bravery in the face of mortal danger, although the higher ranks did not approve of the unwarranted risk.

traits.locale_text: ... a mené personnellement l'assaut, en incitant les gardes par l'exemple à accomplir leur devoir envers l'Empereur-Dieu. Le régiment a fait preuve d'une bravoure sans précédent face à l'adversité, mais les hauts gradés n'ont pas approuvé cette prise de risque inconsidérée.
